ministry.name: Women's Ministry
ministry.overview: The women's ministry focuses on bringing women to Christ, and to building up women in their faith.

long-description.heading: Study
long-description.p: The Women’s Ministry is about seeing people moved by God’s word. This Bible study meets every other Tuesday night (7:00 PM) in the Youth Room. Check the calendar for upcoming meetings.
Our current study is taking us through the book of Ephesians.
long-description.heading: Discipleship
long-description.p: "Heart to Heart" is the one-on-one discipleship, allowing new Christian women to grow in their faith.
